content.detailedDescription:
Around 9am my friend seen a light in the sky. after examining it for a couple seconds he seen 2 beams of light come out from the object going down diagnally but not touching the ground, he tells me what he saw. i look up and realize its the same thing i seen the other night on 4/18/08 this time we counted 6 crafts. they would hover from side to side. up and down and get closer and further away. at one point an airplane passed by one of these objects and when the airplane got close, the object got dimmer as if to hide its presence, when the airplane got further, the ufo would get brighter. the same plane incountered another object that was directly in the planes flight path, when the plane got close the object moved quickly out of its line of flight to avoid collision, when the plane passes the ufo went back to the spot it was hovering at, just minutes after that, 3 more planes come from out of the distance and fly around as if they are checking the area, i went inside to take a break for a while and come back out 30 minutes later, ufos are still there, but in different locations of course. the objects were out from 9pm till 5:45am on 4/22/08

on 2 occasions when i was watching these things, i seen 2 "shooting stars" right by the ufos, i dont know if this has to do with any of this but i didnt see any kind of ufos in my life untill the earthquake on 4/18/08 

this is the second time i have experienced the same thing in 3 days, and i know more people than just me and the airplane pilots seen these things,so please if anyone reports anything like this in the near future or in the past month or so, please contant me at vo0rheez@yahoo.Com thank you very much
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Really bright star with flashing red, blue. white. and orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work around 2:45am, i got to notice a star-like object to the east. well i was coming into sonora, i was about a 1/4 of a mile where 31w and a local road 1136 intersected. well prior i noticed out of the corner of my eye a star-like object in the south that flew in front of the moon i payed it no attention because i assumed it was a plane. i looked again and to my amazement it literally shot into the sky very, very fast i really can't elaborate more on the very. well 2 miles down the road after i got into sonora a 2nd one was still in the east it followed me for the remander of my trip which was about 9 miles. i didn't want to look at it but i noticed a red hue to it. i don't know what they were but i was scared sh--less. (please note the first encounter was 20-25 secs. the 2nd was around 4-5 mins)
content.summary: Two star-like objects

content.detailedDescription: While returning home from an evening college course i sighted a triangle-shaped formation of lights. i was driving up vista drive (an east-west street that runs up a hill) in spring valley, ca. and while i turning into the alleyway that leads to my house i first saw the lights. all the lights were white, and these was a white strobe light underneath. i have seen many commercial aircraft, but none had as many lights as were on this vehicle, and it also lacked the tell-tale red and green running lights aircaft have on their wingtips. i stopped the car to look at this object, which quickly was moving from north to south. the lights were in columns of four apiece and they formed an open-tailed triangle, two columns on the outside, two columns inside, and the strobelight in the middle. from the size i would have to say the object was about five hundred feet in the air unless it was larger than a mid-sized commecial jet; if it was larger i couldn't guess. at no time did i hear any noise from this object; usually you can hear commerical jets even with the car (or house) windows closed and the car motor running. also, i have rarely seen commerical jets fly from north to south in the area because they would be inside mexican airspace within fifteen minutes. san diego's airport is southwest of the area of the sighting, so air traffic over the area is east-west or north-south, but it runs west of the sighting area and not where this object was seen. as the object moved to the south i kept up with it driving along the alleyway, but i quickly lost it over some houses to the south (the area is highly developed.) i don't know if this was an experimental delta-winged jet, a bunch of small lights flying in formation, or a black craft with a plethora of lights; i saw no fuselage or structure supporting the lights. whatever it was did not change shape, break apart, or shine down a beam of light; it seemed to be in a hurry to move south, and it moved straight in that direction.
content.summary: Witnessed triangle pattern of lights moving from north to south at night

content.detailedDescription:
We saw five lights moving somewhat slow from east to west, the lights were about 40 to 50 ft. across and about 70 to 80 ft. long and one light in the middle. a storm was in the distance and it was a dark night, no outline of the body, no plane idenfitcation lights, no flashing lights, no winglights, no flashing plane taillights, wider than a c5a galaxy loadmaster. just five lights moving somewhat slow across the night sky, it must of been about 1000 to 1500 ft. up and a bout 1/2 to 1 mile away.

my wife and i were driving home on i-85 just outside of charlotte, nc. headed south and we were waching to see lighting in the distance, when we came around a turn and saw these five lights moving across the sky. we looked at it and could not figuer out just what was holding five white lights up in the sky. we looked at it for about 10 to 15 sec. and it went beyond some trees, so i speed up to get around the bend in the road and it was gone. as we talked about what we saw, we watched 3 planes come towards the airport and made comparisons to what we saw. we could see the out line of the plane, the red/whites lights on the nose wingtips and tail of the plane. then we saw a plane way out, comming in, we could see 
the one light on the nose of the plane, and the flash on the wingtips.

i'm a disable vet and have been around and seen lots of planes, and i know this was not a plane. i do think their are ufo's and i could not identfy what this was. i do however know that it was huuuge. i keep trying to figure out and compare it to something, but i can't, it is unknow to me.
my wife allyson also was in the military and knows planes, but she too could not explane what it was that she saw.
allyson is or was a sceptic.
content.summary: Moved very slow from east to west along i-85 watch for 10sec. went behind trees drove very fast to see it and it was gone

content.detailedDescription: Luke air force base says they are not using military flares tonight. the lights were the same shape nad style as the infamous lights from 1997. the local news media has been reporting this sighting most of the evening.
content.summary: Same as the phoenix lights

content.detailedDescription: A few minutes after the 11 pm news started my husband was out front with the dogs when he hollered to come out because there was something in the sky with 2 legs. i saw an object(s) in the western sky that appeared app. 10x larger than any star in the sky. it was 2 parallel lines glowing, no, shining, glimmering, a bright orange with 2 line at the center glowing a hazy orange. the 2 parallel lines were horizontal. i went & got my binoculars, and, to my surprise, the 2 lines appeared horizontal and were glowing red, white, & blue with a white halo. i looked again with the naked and it was still orange. never had that happen before! it was traveling from the west to the north east. it traveled in silence and did pass directly overhead. it was visible app. 3 to 5 min. i lost sight of it as it went behind my home. a plane passed in the opposite dir. from west to south east, and it was normal. we've scene ufo's out here before but this seemed different. i had no idea what it and still don't. i tend to be sceptical and quite frequently believe most sightings are the government.
content.summary: Lasted app. 5 min. extremely odd appearance that differed between naked eye & binocular

content.detailedDescription: This is something that has bothered me since i was a kid because i cannot find any other explanation for this other than it was a ufo. i was about 7 or 8 at the time. it was fall and star wars had just come out. i was at a friend's house and we were playing in an upstairs bedroom. i heard a whistling noise and went over to the bed to look out the window. i pulled up the shade and saw a large ufo right in front of the window. it was close enough that i could see the outline of a door and there was a red light and a green light underneath it.  the angle that i saw was the bottom and the side of the ufo. it was disc shaped,  like something you would see in star wars or something similar. it was a beige/gold color and there were lines where the metal was fitted together. it was maybe 30-40 feet. i was stunned and told my friend, who came to the window and saw it too. the object hovered outside in front of the window, it was not moving or was not moving very fast when we saw it. we ran downstairs to tell his mom and uncle, but of course they did not believe us.
content.summary: Saw a disk shaped ufo that looked like a star wars type object

content.detailedDescription: The lights hung in formation for a few minutes and then we could see them moving independantly of one another. my neighbor came and got me shortly after 8pm.  finally the lights blinked out one at a time over a period of 3 or 4 minutes. they were the size of the nearby stars.  probably flares????
content.summary: 4 red lights in eastern sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling east on i-10 from katy toward houston at 6:35 am. the sun was rising but no seen yet. the moment i started traveling on the freeway i saw 2 very short chemtrail (i think that is what they are called)in the east/northeast sky, in front of me. short as in,if i held a dime at arms width up to it in the sky the chemtrails were shorter than even a dime. they were going straight down. i immediately thought that was strange. chemtrails dont usually go straight down. right below the chemtrails was an object. the object was not moving in any direction it was staying in one place. the chemtrails disappered and the object was still there. i could not make out the shape of the object or color, but it seems to be a reflective surface because the sun was rising and the object appeared to get brighter as the sun rose. or maybe it was a light getting brighter or dimmer. not sure but it seemed more like a solid object, not like a light. i watched this object while i was slowly creeping through traffic on the freeway for about 25 minutes. i was wondering if anyone else saw it. it was visible, why wouldnt anyone else see it? it was not very close however. at one point it seemed to get smaller or dimmer but then returned to its orginal size or brightness.
i had to get off the freeway because of construction and when i did and got back on, i lost it in the sky. could not find it anywhere. this was about 7:00am. it was just gone. there is no way it was an airplane, helicopter, hot air baloon, or weather balloon.
content.summary: Bright object hung in sky for atleast 25 minutes

content.detailedDescription: At the time of the incident i was on active duty in the usaf, i was staff sergeant working munitions control building 58 at hill afb.  at approximately 2 am the airman i was working with and i went outside to have cigarettes.  it was a very quiet and clear night.  as we smoked our cigarettes we turned towards the wasatch mountains and saw a very large chevron shaped object (about the size of a football field) flying very slowly over the mountain range.  i remember not seeing any lights, but didn't think anything of it at the time.  the only reason we could see the object was because the night sky was very bright from the moon.  about ten to fifteen minutes past and the airman and i finished our smokes and went back inside to finish our work for the evening.  once inside the airman looked at me and asked if i had heard anything?  immediately i felt clammy all over almost having a panic attack.  we ran back outside to see if it was still there, however it was gone. we never observed the object again. as i reflect back on my 22 years of service (retired msgt usaf) i have observed many different kinds aircraft in my career.  the object that we saw that night was without a doubt the strangest object i ever saw.
content.summary: Observed chevron shaped object making no sound and moving slowly over the wasatch mountains

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were at the army navy academy on the 2nd floor of a building there looking out the windows to the north which were wide open. it was a clear night. a block away from where we were and to the north are some houses. behind these homes to the north the terrain drops down a good 300 feet or so down to a lagoon which connects to the pacific ocean. from where we were, it was a block or less to the west to the beach. this lagoon is what separates carlsbad from oceanside, ca along the coast. as far as the date, i was in eighth grade at the time so it would have been between sept. 1981 and june 1982. i don't remember the exact month or day so i typed in jan. 15th, 1982 as an approximate date. it was around midnight.

what i saw was a bright yellow disc shaped object move from east to west and stop in the air over where the lagoon is about 1-2 blocks away to the north. it's hard to say the exact size but i would estimate it to be 40 feet from end to end and maybe 10 feet tall in the center. the yellow color was very bright. this object made some kind of very low pitch humming sound. the sound was faint but audible. it stopped in the air i'd say a good 80 feet plus in the air and stayed there still for about 4-6 seconds. then it dropped straight down behind the homes to the north into the lagoon area. i didn't see it again. i was kinda stunned for a second just looking that way wondering what i'd just seen when my friend and i both said to each other at the same time, "did you see that ?" after discussing it, we both saw the exact same thing.

i thought i'd report this in case somebody else may have seen something similar in that area around that time.
content.summary: Bright yellow disc

content.detailedDescription:
Was in my den on the eastern side of my house and i was looking out my windows towards the south and saw an oval object  that was hovering and going around in circles. at the same time i was hearing a loud humming sound and i passed out on the couch. i heard this sound twice. this sound did not last long. on investigation myself i went out about a week later and found about 50 feet from my house an oval marking on the ground that was cinged...This was about 30 feet wide. 

i felt very afraid...There were dogs barking...

tuesday of the next week i saw a object outside circling. i was in my den again and went to draw the curtain on the windows and notice a tall shrub with strange looking burning red lights...
content.summary: Was in my den on the eastern side of my house and i was looking out my windows towards the south and saw an oval object  that was hovering and going around in circles.

content.detailedDescription:
My ex-girfriend and i were on our way to see friends, although she insists family. i thought it was a monday night because we used to go to the quest night club salsa night mondays. i later realized that it was indeed a saturday night and she had agreed this to be true.
we were crossing the 46th ave bridge in south mpls., a vehicle was being chased by the police. the squad car almost hit my car, i got very upset and yelled a few words at the police.
we proceeded to turn left to access the 35w freeway, i'm sure she was trying to calm me down cause if i know me. i know i must have been pretty heated. i remember going down the entrance to 35w and the next thing i remember is being on the freeway somewhere before lake street.
something caught my attention and the attention of my ex-girlfriend as well. there was this sphere/orb above the vehicle approximately 50-60 ft.
above my car heading in a northernly direction toward downtown mpls.
i noticed it was very bright and looked metallic, i thought the lights from the cars on freeway and city were reflecting off of it. my ex and i
both looked at each other with our mouths dropped in disbelief i said something to the fact like," what the ----, is that a, i don't ------- believe it" something to that nature. we watched as it headed slowly toward the city center.
we heard no sound the entire time coming from it, it took probably 5-7 seconds  at a gradual ascent to reach the downtown area, once it over the buildings by the ids center it hesitated or hovered for only a second and then shot straight up toward space, like from just over the top of buildings into orbit or space ina matter of 1-2 seconds and vanished.
we were both speechless,shocked,in awe all i know is i could'nt find anything to say and neither did she.
when we got to our destination everyone asked why we were so late, we tried to tell them but they said we were crazy and acted like wew were
trying to hide something from them. 
anyway no one believed us, my ex lives in florida were still good friends we never really talk about then or now. when i ask her  about it some times she'll say "is there anybody by you that can hear you" or something like that. and i say,"why i don't care if there is or not i don't have a problem talking about it", but evidently she does if some one is around me. i know one thing we will always remember the night we seen a u.F.O.
content.summary: My ex and i witnessed a u.F.O heading toward downtown minneapolis.

content.detailedDescription: In the middle of august of 2007 i drove up to mc gregor road (45-48.420n, 123-24.974w) off of highway 26 west in the tillamook state forrest to watch the peresid meteor shower. the skies were mostly clear but there were some patches of clouds. i was scanning the sky hoping to catch sight of my first meteor when off to the west i noticed a bright white light. at first i thought it must be the landing lights of an aircraft that was heading towards me, but i soon realized that the light was moving in a southerly direction and that ruled out landing lights. in addition i could not see any navigation lights nor any strobe or beacon. i next thought that i may be seeing a satellite that was traveling just above the horizon but it just seemed too bright to be such. i put my binoculars on the object and that verified my feeling that it was not a satellite nor a aircraft. the light was of a very bright intensity and very white in color. the intensity and color remained constant. it traveled at a constant velocity and did not seem to change direction or height. the light then went behind some trees that were about a half a mile away or so. the light would disappear as it���s view was interrupted by a tree and then reappear when the view was unobstructed. when the light passed beyond the trees i was then able to see that the light was fairly distant, maybe 5-10 miles away and that it was traveling fairly rapidly. faster than a jet aircraft would have gone at that distance and much slower than a meteor. its��� size was about 5-8 times that of the biggest star in the sky.  about the time i came to the conclusion that this light was not a normal aircraft or celestial object it disappeared. there were some trees on a distant hill and i couldn���t tell whether it had gone behind those trees or if it had just left the sky. i looked for it for several minutes and kept checking that part of the sky for the next couple of hours but never caught sight of it again. the whole sighting lasted maybe 4-5 minutes. i did see a total of 55 meteors that night. since it was just a bright light i didn���t think there was must use of reporting it, but when i read that there have been other sightings of a similar nature in the state i decided to file this report.
content.summary: Very bright light traveling at a fast speed.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving on hwy 60 to twin cities near st.James mn was talking to wife and when i looked up in the sky i saw a brite object that looked like a brite star it was very cloudey and rainey that day the object was about mid level with the clouds and then it disapered when it disapered it was like the object got smaller and smaller in the ski like it was pulled back i guess when i saw it i was in ahh i told my wife i saw and she said why didint you tell me i said it was to quick about a mile or to later we stopped at a rest stop i felt no feelings just that was cool to have seen such a thing this something i mite wont to study or join mufon to study such objects i live near south dakota wich has no mufon chapter.
content.summary: Star like object

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i were 15 yrs old laying in sleeping bags on the deschutes river in july. we were seeing several satellites from different directions...Then one came from the south. except this one stopped directly overhead, then proceded to fly  backwards in the shape of 2 sides of a triangle to get back on course and go back south at 3-4 times faster than its approach.
content.summary: Watching for satellites on a very clear nite, watched one come from the south, stop and go 45 degrees backward then 45 down and go south at high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
We were up against the window looking out when it went by.  it was much higher then my window that from the ground up about 8 feet high, our home is on pier blocks and cinder blocks.  the distance was about twenty feet in front of us and about sixty feet up.  it was awesome it was doing gravitational pulls left and right and left and right.  awesome!  it appeared to be a silver tone saucer. 

the window had no screens on it so we stuck our heads out the window and watched the saucer until it passed out of sight. 

the saucer that we saw out my window with the gravitational pull  appeared to be silver, i don't recall any lights on it, but it made no sound.  pretty common with them not to make noise.  if one did i would think it's ours, and not theirs?
content.summary: Dull metallic saucer flew by within 20 feet of witnesses at very high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I had just picked up my grandson from the hardin valley elementary school,and was traveling north on steele rd.When i noticed bright cylinder to my right in cloudless bright blue sky.It appeared to be stationary but i was going 3o mph so as i was slowing down i asked my 8 year old if he saw what i was seeing and he said yes. i stopped to see if my being stationary would allow me to see more detail such as wings,but object appeared to become so bright it hurt my eyes ,at which point it appeared to start moving ,accelerate and as i turned my head to the right it dissappeared. object was low in sky, about 1500 feet and about half a mile to the east. i had a grove of trees which where about 50 feet tall that the object was above and beyond which helped with depth perception.Object seemed to be longer than commercial jet but not taller. all  commercial jets where highly visibile ,leaving contrails.At this point i drove about 500 feet and turned left heading west and to higher elevevation where i was able to scan the sky unobstructed.As i was looking i noticed a light brown cylinder shape to the northeast,with no wings ,no aviation lights and maybe 10 miles away,close to or over oakridge. i observed a private plane southeast at longer distance,but was able to easily see wings.The sighting was so brief i had no time to get a picture .After having told a neighbor about it,he said that he was told that according to someone who is in the oakridge enginering community,they pretty much have cloaking technology about perfected.But what the heck are they cloaking .This would explain why they have already retired the 117 stealth fighter.
content.summary: Bright silver cylinder which got intensely bright and appeared to go from no movement tofast acceleration and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: While working out side at the resort we work my co worked and i spotted a rounnd object flying slowl about maybe 100 feet above our resort. it was moving right along the shore line from north to south. we keep a cheap digtal camera in our office . i ran and could only get one shot of it before it picked up speed rapidly and disappeared. the picture isnt good quailty i am afraid but i was excited and the camera is a cheap one. but in the photo you can see my co worker looking up at it in the upper right hand corner
content.summary: Sighted object moving from north to south

content.detailedDescription: My and my kids were riding our bikes when we saw a round white ufo blinking a red light. this ufo was way high in the sky and it was being chase by 3 giants airplanes. i had never seen 3 huge airplanes flying in an indian line, they looked to me like they were goin after that object.
content.summary: A blinking ufo was chased by 3 big airplanes

content.detailedDescription: On the morning of 4/10/08 i was on my way to meet a friend. it was easiest for her to spot me if i parked in a gas station, so i did. i was parked on the south east corner facing the west, plain view of oncoming traffic. i was looking for my friend to drive up when i decided to look at the sky.  thats when a bright star caught my complete attention.  the star was at a norht west position and it moved slowly like a ballon. thats what i thought it was a shiny ballon but then it stopped. and held its position for a couple of minutes then it begun to move again, i did noticed something else lingering around it but it was to blurry to make out a shape. the ufo then bagan on a straight south movement but in a slow motion pace. then it started getting smaller and smaller thats  when i figured it was leaving our atmosphere, it moved up very slow the ufo began to get smaller and smaller and one thing the brightness never faded untill i could not see it any more. i know it was a ufo, i have never seen a ballon or helicopter or plane do anything of what seen that day. specialy it holding its position for a while with out flickering or fading or moving and it could no be a sattelite that fell into our atmosphere then shot back out. i originaly placed a call and left a message and then whent on this site minutes after on my blackberry but was unable to submit a complete report. i now have a home computer and am able to submit a report. im impressed by this sighting but i want to see more.... this is addicting!
content.summary: Bright star like dot in the sky moved like nothing ive seen before

content.detailedDescription: i was at mcdonalds restraunt in midland michigan at about 2 to 3 pm on saturday april 19.  i got out of my car to stretch, and happened to look to the east towards saginaw. at first i saw the vapor trail, following the trail i saw the object. but usually you can faintly make out the plane that is making the trail. all that i could make out was a bright object at the end. and usually you will be able to faintly hear the jet, yet this object was silent. i carry a pair of hunting binoculars in my car, i got them out so i could get a better look at it. what i saw was an object that was very bright, and oval in shape. the first thing that i noticed that was odd about this object was its vapor trail. i estimate the object to have been about 1-1 1/2 miles in the air. its vapor trail was wide, about twice the size of the object. the trail was cylindrical in shape and it was spiraled . at first i thought it might be a meteor, but it could not have been, because when it first appeared in the east it was on approximately a 30 degree angle going north, then shifted direction on a more 32 degrees angle. ultimately meteors dont change angles like that. it took only about a minute and  a half to travel from east to west.
content.summary: Fast moving object comming from the southeast heading northwest.

content.detailedDescription:
Jet plains/ufo? created the astrisk/star image while my wife mary and i was sitting on the car port facing south toward out hometown of king, nc near winston salem, nc.
there were six jets or what appeared to be military planes in our line of vision from the south side of out home.
i was standing there wondering why so many in a short space in out sky. as i watched two of them that seemed close together mad an x and i noticed another starting his run toward going across the center of the x. thai's when i took off for my digital camera.
it was less than 40 seconds until i was ready for the shot at what was now a six pointed star or asterisk. i took three pictures and the best one i reduces in order that it may be viewed better.
the thing was that all six of the aircraft were no where in sight when i took the picture. they were gone and no contrails were present except from the six pointed star/astrisk. 
there were no contrails leading from or to the contrail image that the picture demonstrates.
content.summary: What appeared to ne jet planes made an astrisk/star

content.detailedDescription:
about midnight on july 17 2007 i was woke up by very loud lightning and thunder.  by 12:10 i had gotten up to go outside and watch the storm.
  after watching several cloud to ground strikes i noticed that a couple of bolts were going cloud to cloud from the east to the north. since i like to count strike to thunder seconds for distance i noticed these bolts were visible from 3 to 4 seconds and did not produce any audible thunder.  they were fairly straight bolts and in one spot little branches would fork of the main bolt and the cloud in that area would glow.
the feelings i had about what i saw next are very hard to describe as i am still in awe of the experience.
  the third bolt shot across in exactly the same place and the same manner as the first two except this time the clouds parted and right there in plain sight was a solid glassy looking metallic craft in the clouds.  the lightning was dancing all over the slightly curved surface of the object.  that was only visible for about two seconds until the bolt dissipated then all was dark again. this sighting was a 12:17 am
  i waited several minutes for something to happen again but nothing.  i don���t know if the object left the area or the clouds moved in to hide it from my view.  the thunderstorm lasted for another halfhour.
content.summary: Glass like metalic object interacting with lightning bolts in the clouds during an intense lightning storm.

content.detailedDescription: My 6 year old daughter and i witnessed an incredible event. my neighbors shot off some big mortars, and about five minutes after it was over, here comes two glowing spheres one yellowish white and the other completely red. they where definitely separate objects and were moving faster than all of the regular air traffic that are always up in the sky, "i live right next to an airport". when the objects passed my house with no sound the red one split into three all of which were red and glowed dimmer until they vanished. the cream colored one didn't, and when the cream one was way off in the distance , the red one reappeared. not being a good parent i said wtf. this could have been a scene from a science fiction movie but it really happened. earlier  that day i saw something metallic hanging over the city but what happened at night was definitely cool.
content.summary: Two fairly fast moving different color,"one cream and one red" buzzed my nieghborhood after private fireworks display. no sound

content.detailedDescription: My friend and her sister told me about this sighting that happened 2 years ago in los angeles, ca.  they saw a triangle craft with blue and green lights.  they saw it from the balcony of their apartments.  they said they never saw anything like it, and it has weird movements.  it also had a visible trail.  when they found a camera to photograph it, the thing was gone but it left a trail.  i am submitting the photograph she emailed me.  please email me at beastamerica@yahoo.Com if you find this interesting too.  i still can ask her questions, but guide me on what relevant questions to ask.
content.summary: Triangle ufo with green and blue lights, trail photographed

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of friday, april 18, 2008, at approximately 9:30pm, my partner and i had just finished eating dinner with a friend at his apartment and we were sitting outside on our friend's 11th floor apartment balcony, talking and enjoying the city lights. his balcony faces approximately north-west or north-north-west and is located near the intersection of i-25 and colorado, just south of east florida avenue in denver, colorado.

i was looking at the city lights and kept noticing a flash of light in my peripheral vision. there were several aircraft flying by so i assumed i was simply seeing their faa lights. each time i turned my attention to see which plane it might be, there wasn't anything there. i was trying to zero in on where the light was because it kept disappearing. finally, after about 4 more flashes, i zeroed in on it's location and watched, hoping to see it again. up until this point i had been sitting on one of the chairs on the balcony. when i finally focused on the light's location, i got up and stepped to the balcony wall and asked my friends to look at what i was seeing. at first they thought i was referring to one of the passing planes but i finally got them to see what i was pointing out.

the white light was slowly flashing, not like a strobe light, but as if someone were turning on and off a car headlight. it didn't flash like an aircraft faa light. it slowly turned on and off over the course of 1-second. and it seemed to flash once every 2-3 seconds. when the flashing light was off there was no indication of any other lights and since it was night, there was no indication of the shape, size or relative distance away from my location. the light didn't seem to move from it's original location from one flash to the next. the light seemed unusually large to be an aircraft light. we watched the light flash about 4-5 times before it simply stopped.

i watched the sky for several more minutes to see if it would appear again in it's original location or if it might be seen somewhere else in our available field of vision but nothing happened. we continued to see aircraft fly by overhead but the light never re-appeared.
content.summary: Slowly flashing light over denver, colorado

content.detailedDescription:
Jan.20,2007
around 1:00 am
my sister, who lives on the same property who stepped out onto her porch to smoke,called and woke me and said "get up now and look out your back door".She seemed frightened so i jumped up and looked through the window in the door and immediately saw what she was upset about. there was a large object in the sky visable just over my storage barn that looked like an explosion of some sort in slow motion .She and i watched it for several minutes (her on her front porch me on my back porch)then i got my witts about me and went in and got my camera.It looked like a cloud with brightly colored lights tumbling randomly around inside it.It was in constant motion but seemed to to remain stationary as if it were hoovering in the same place.The object also had a kind of halo around it.I took about a dozen pictures of it thinking that my inexpensive digital camera (kodak z740) would not pick it up as it does not get good photos in low light and this was in the middle of the night.I then went in and got my video camera and got a few minutes on it but it was so cold and i was pretty scared so i was shaking and it was hard even with bracing in my doorway to keep the camera on it.After almost an hour and a half it began to move due west away from us and in about five minutes it was gone.I remember thinking at the time to be very quiet and to keep my lights off because i didn't want to alert it to my presence.

late febuary 
around 3:00 am
my sister called to say the same thing was back but i got outside only in time to see it moving off to the west and got no photoes of it.

march 22,2007
around 11:30 pm i was again alerted by a call from my sister that the odd thing in the sky is back and in the same place .This time knowing that my camera would pick it up i got it and my tripod and set them up on my small back porch.Not being camera savy i took several pictures using different settings or modes and ended up with about 25 photos.I also took some more video tape.Having told him about our previous experience i telephoned my brother who lives about 100 miles south of us  in jacksonville ,ar.Because he said if it happened again he wanted to check and see if it was high enough for him to catch sight of,but it was not.We watched the show it put on for about 3 1/2 or 4 hours and this time when it began to move away to the west we felt braver and tried to follow it in my car but soon lost sight of it.

april 20,2007
at about 10:00 pm i was walking through my living room on my way to bed and when i turned off the lights i saw the glow from the object again this time from my window so i called my sister and once again set up my tripod and got about 25 pictures of it.We watched it for a couple of hours but having convinced ouselves it must be some kind natural occurance we went on to bed.

it was not untill some time later that while talking to my step daughter about it and sending her the pictures over the internet via google's picasa program that shows you the information on each photo such as when it was downloaded, that we relized that we were seeing this at or about the same time every month.To be honest i had forgotten all about it until my brother called and said he had happened to see a program on the history channel called
  ufo hunters
episode: 2008 texas ufo
and he wanted me to watch the rerun of it today because the pictures looked shockingly simular to mine.And i must agree they do and with the whole thing being totaly silent the same way that the people described on your show i thought they might be the same.The photos do not give the live occurrence justice but i hope they will be of some help.If you would like to see all the pictures please just send me an email address so that i can put them on a private album for you at picasa
content.summary: Very bright form,constant motion yet remained in same position,at times looked like ball of cloud with colored lights tumbling through it

content.detailedDescription: Thursday night april 17th at 10:05 pm.It was cloudy that night with low clouds and we were standing outside because we had been seeing lights in space all week but that night we could not see into space because it was cloudy.On monday we were looking at the three star triangle in space and we saw what appeared to be a light like a star move thru the triangle from south to north and thirty minutes later it went back thru from north to south.We were outside talking about what we had seen on monday night when all of the sudden it came out of the clouds close to us and it was shaped like a v and it had lights  around it and it was transparent white looking and it came towards us at about 300 feet in the air and we got a very good look at it.When it came over us it was moving slow and it had lights around it and they changed the lights and went from looking like a v to a diamond shape and it was totally silent and after it passed over us we looked at it from behind and we saw a narrow white light that was about 50 feet wide and then it turned the light off and we saw a black craft about 50 feet wide and it went back into the clouds.Three of us saw it and we came to the conclusion that it wasn't from this world it was incredible i have never seen anything like it ever.Tonight we are going to be looking into space with a camcorder so we can record anything that looks unusual.
content.summary: It was cloudy and it came out of the clouds at about 300 feet.

content.detailedDescription:
Ann was asleep in her bedroom and was awakened by a flash of bright light through her bedroom window over grants pass peak  a few seconds later there was another bright flash of light in same place as first flash.

she then saw through her bedroom window an egg shaped white light the size of a car fly towards the mountain about a mile away followed by another egg shaped white light the size of a car a few seconds later. the second egg shaped light followed the first light a bit behind and to the side of the first egg shaped light.

she watched the lights go half way across her window and then she got out of bed and went down the hall through the living room and dining room and out into the backyard to continue observing them.

she was surprised at how huge and bright they were. from a mile away they were the size of full sized cars. they were traveling slowly and she watched them until they flew behind grants pass peak. there appeared to be a bright light on the mountain where they went out of sight behind the mountain.

she estimated the total distance she watched them was over two miles.
content.summary: Two huge egg shaped lights flew over grants pass peak
